entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 March 2023
